test.query: SELECT count() FROM numbers(200000000) WHERE NOT ignore(intDiv(number, 1000000000))
SELECT count() FROM numbers(200000000) WHERE NOT ignore(divide(number, 1000000000))
SELECT count() FROM numbers(200000000) WHERE NOT ignore(toUInt32(divide(number, 1000000000)))
select intDiv((number+2), toNullable(number+1)) from system.numbers limit 100000000 format Null
